GSD.description:
net: sfp: fix memory leak in sfp_probe()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.56 by commit 204543581a2f26bb3b997a304c0bd06926ba7f15. For more details please see the references link.
